languages.text: "Когда мы были на Тассере, мне стоило меньше думать о том, что думают окружающие, и больше — о том, как не отдавить тебе ноги. Я исправляюсь".
"When we were on Thassera, I should have thought less about what the people around me thought and more about how to avoid stamping on your toes. I am trying to make up for it now."
languages.original_text: "Когда мы были на Тассере, мне стоило меньше думать о том, что думают окружающие, и больше — о том, как не отдавить тебе ноги. Я исправляюсь".

traits.locale_text: "When we were on Thassera, I should have thought less about what the people around me thought and more about how to avoid stamping on your toes. I am trying to make up for it now."
"When we were on Thassera, I should have thought less about what the people around me thought and more about how to avoid stamping on your toes. I am trying to make up for it now."
"When we were on Thassera, I should have thought less about what the people around me thought and more about how to avoid stamping on your toes. I am trying to make up for it now."
"When we were on Thassera, I should have thought less about what the people around me thought and more about how to avoid stamping on your toes. I am trying to make up for it now."
"When we were on Thassera, I should have thought less about what the people around me thought and more about how to avoid stamping on your toes. I am trying to make up for it now."

languages.text: 「タッセーラにいたときは、周囲の目を気にするよりも、あなたの足を踏まない方法を考えるべきでした。今、その埋め合わせをさせてください」
languages.original_text: "When we were on Thassera, I should have thought less about what the people around me thought and more about how to avoid stamping on your toes. I am trying to make up for it now."

traits.locale_text: 「タッセーラにいたときは、周囲の目を気にするよりも、あなたの足を踏まない方法を考えるべきでした。今、その埋め合わせをさせてください」

languages.text: "Ich hätte auf Thassera weniger daran denken sollen, was die Lete um mich herum denken, und mehr daran, Euch nicht ständig auf die Füße zu treten. Ich versuche gerade, das wiedergutzumachen."
languages.original_text: "When we were on Thassera, I should have thought less about what the people around me thought and more about how to avoid stamping on your toes. I am trying to make up for it now."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hätte auf Thassera weniger daran denken sollen, was die Lete um mich herum denken, und mehr daran, Euch nicht ständig auf die Füße zu treten. Ich versuche gerade, das wiedergutzumachen."

languages.text: « Quand nous étions sur Thassera, j'aurais dû être plus attentif à ne pas vous marcher sur les pieds, au lieu de me préoccuper du qu'en-dira-t-on. Et je m'efforce à présent de me rattraper. »
languages.original_text: "When we were on Thassera, I should have thought less about what the people around me thought and more about how to avoid stamping on your toes. I am trying to make up for it now."

traits.locale_text: « Quand nous étions sur Thassera, j'aurais dû être plus attentif à ne pas vous marcher sur les pieds, au lieu de me préoccuper du qu'en-dira-t-on. Et je m'efforce à présent de me rattraper. »

languages.text: «Cuando estábamos en Thassera, debí preocuparme menos por lo que pensaba la gente y más por no interponerme en sus asuntos. Me gustaría enmendar ese error».
languages.original_text: "When we were on Thassera, I should have thought less about what the people around me thought and more about how to avoid stamping on your toes. I am trying to make up for it now."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando estábamos en Thassera, debí preocuparme menos por lo que pensaba la gente y más por no interponerme en sus asuntos. Me gustaría enmendar ese error».

languages.text: “当初我们在塔瑟拉的时候，我应该少考虑些周围人的想法，多想想如何避免踩到舞伴的脚趾。现在，我正在努力弥补当时的错误。”
languages.original_text: "When we were on Thassera, I should have thought less about what the people around me thought and more about how to avoid stamping on your toes. I am trying to make up for it now."

traits.locale_text: “当初我们在塔瑟拉的时候，我应该少考虑些周围人的想法，多想想如何避免踩到舞伴的脚趾。现在，我正在努力弥补当时的错误。”

languages.text: "Thassera'dayken etrafımdakiler ne diyecek diye değil, nasıl ayağına basmamalıyım diye düşünmeliydim. Şimdi telafi etmek istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "When we were on Thassera, I should have thought less about what the people around me thought and more about how to avoid stamping on your toes. I am trying to make up for it now."

traits.locale_text: "Thassera'dayken etrafımdakiler ne diyecek diye değil, nasıl ayağınıza basmamalıyım diye düşünmeliydim. Şimdi telafi etmek isterim."

languages.original_text: "When we were on Thassera, I should have thought less about what the people around me thought and more about how to avoid stamping on your toes. I am trying to make up for it now."
